thread.section_title: Macro Mediterranean Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Macro Mediterranean | macro-mediterranean.com
thread.title: Natassia Marchbanks
thread.title_full: Macro Mediterranean reviewed by Natassia Marchbanks

author: Natassia Marchbanks
title: Natassia Marchbanks
text: Sarah was so very helpful, every single dish is amazing and flavorful, low sodium, and filling. Their packaging is recyclable or reusable. It's also the most affordable, customizable meal delivery service (ready-made) that I've been able to find, WITH a wide shipping radius!!!
